info.name: Livejournal Modern (customizable) Chrome
info.description:
Make LJ less ugly. Includes ad removal but you might still need Adblock.

~ Firefox users go here: http://userstyles.org/styles/25941/
~ Editing instructions: http://eevereon.livejournal.com/80162.html
